preparation.raw_text:
1. Wear appropriate personal protective equipment (PPE) including gloves, goggles, and a dust mask. 
 2. Weigh out 12.00 g of Beryllium oxide (BeO) using an analytical balance. 
 3. Weigh out 26.00 g of Potassium oxide (K2O). 
 4. Weigh out 32.00 g of Selenium (Se). 
 5. Weigh out 20.00 g of Titanium dioxide (TiO2). 
 6. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine all weighed ingredients thoroughly using a ceramic mortar and pestle until a homogenous powder is obtained.
